title: 404 error/Label API
patterns: 404 error/Label API
fixSteps: Open the order and check if a label has been printed, but the order still shows as ‚ÄòPacked‚Äô.
If yes, create asana card for the FC to cancel the labels and reship the orders. E.g.: https://app.asana.com/0/1200737019007719/1206934937449352/f
If no then retry to print the label it should work as there might be a timeout error

title: ADDRESS ALERT: if the destination is Australia -PO BOX addresses
patterns: ADDRESS ALERT: if the destination is Australia -PO BOX addresses
fixSteps: PO BOX ‚Äî- street name
no. ‚Äî- house number
doesnt need a number in the company name like dhl

fixSteps: Open URL for resolution

title: Carrier response doesn't contain a label.
patterns: Carrier response doesn't contain a label.
fixSteps: Check if the letters in the address are in the English alphabet; if they are not, ask Chat GPT to translate them for you and enter that into the address instead. You have to delete everything that is not in the English alphabet and then resolve the issue,

title: City "Ensure this field has no more than X characters.‚Äù
patterns: City "Ensure this field has no more than X characters.‚Äù
city
fixSteps: Count the X first characters in the city field in the address and delete the rest
Only if 30 characters:
Then open the shipping method in AA and click on edit: https://app.hive.app/admin/shipping_methods and click on the check box:

title: Company_name: "Ensure this field has no more than 50 characters.‚Äù
patterns: Company_name: "Ensure this field has no more than 50 characters.‚Äù
company_name
fixSteps: Count the 50 first characters in the company field in the address and delete the rest

title: ["consignee: Please enter a house number.", "consignee: The address could not be encoded to a routing code."]
patterns: ["consignee: Please enter a house number.", "consignee: The address could not be encoded to a routing code."]
fixSteps: 1. Check if there is a space in the house number field or extra characters like ‚Äú. , /‚Äù
2. Check if there is any extra characters like ‚Äú. , / ‚Äú in the street field
3. Delete it
4. Save the changes in the address
5. Try to print the shipping label again

If you do not charge postage charges, please enter 0.00.", "customs.items[0]: The value in the Weight / Unit field must be in the format 0.000 kg and value must be greater than 0."]
postal
weight

patterns: ["details.weight.value: Parameter value must not exceed a value of 31500."]
weight
fixSteps: weight issue either asana or make it multiple shipments

title: DOM-TOM regions
patterns: DOM-TOM regions
fixSteps: ‚Ä¢ The country must not be France, but instead the Island of the location
‚Ä¢ Addresses most of the time do not have house numbers, check on Google Maps before creating address validations

title: Email address or phone number missing
patterns: Email address or phone number missing
email
phone
fixSteps: Open URL for resolution

title: endcloud error occurred: Please use the normal_printer endpoint when printing A4 labels
patterns: endcloud error occurred: Please use the normal_printer endpoint when printing A4 labels
fixSteps: Copy the picking basket --> On Shipment page, cancel the label --> Press Cmd +Ctrl+ Shift + B --> paste the picking basket number --> Retry printing the label.

title: Enter a valid email address
patterns: Enter a valid email address
email
fixSteps: Check if the email address has a √¢, √´, √Ø, √∂, or «î and if yes, change it to the equivalent without umlaut.

title: Error : consignments[0].articles[0].quantity: Must have a maximum value of 500 for meineinkauf
patterns: Error : consignments[0].articles[0].quantity: Must have a maximum value of 500 for meineinkauf
fixSteps: The limit is on single SKU.
So split the shipment into 2
https://hive-app-hq.slack.com/archives/C039C1DQB1R/p1763565749033869

title: Error message: consignee: Please enter a house number. consignee: The adress could not be encoded to a routing code.
patterns: Error message: consignee: Please enter a house number. consignee: The adress could not be encoded to a routing code.
fixSteps: Check if in the street name or house number has ‚Äò - ‚Äô , ‚Äò / ‚Äô sign
If yes ‚Üí then delete these signs and put a space instead. And save the address and resolve the delivery restriction.
If not ‚Üí then check the address and raise address validation issue if the address is not correct .

title: Error Message:["consignments[0]: Consignment measurements (dimensions, grossWeight, articleValue) exceed limitations of available shipment types"]
patterns: Error Message:["consignments[0]: Consignment measurements (dimensions, grossWeight, articleValue) exceed limitations of available shipment types"]
weight
fixSteps: If we get this error message and in address line to we have ‚ÄúCase Postale 262‚Äù and the carrier is
DPD CH MeinEinkauf DDP then we can change the shipping method to-Swiss Post CH MeinEinkauf DDP

As mentioned in https://linear.app/hive-logistics/issue/DFB2B-3506/tech-support-cannot-create-shipping-label linear ticket and the relevant slack https://hive-logistics.slack.com/archives/C039C1DQB1R/p1747906847431999

title: Error message mentioned postal code
patterns: Error message mentioned postal code
postal
fixSteps: Open the order on Google Maps and check the postal code. Contrast the postal code on the order and the one in google maps, see if there are any issues, and create an address validation.
Check that the country is correct and if not correct ‚Üí update it.

title: {"errors":{"id":"expected String to be a id"}} - Glucose Goddess
patterns: {"errors":{"id":"expected String to be a id"}} - Glucose Goddess
fixSteps: Shipment to Italy, Check on Google Map the location and select carrier as follows:
For Mainland: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Mainland
For Saridinia: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Saridinia
For Sicily Calabria: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Sicily Calabria

title: For all other merchants except Glucose Goddess with the error message: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order value is not in Euros; convert it to Euros for Delivengo, as only Euros are accepted."
patterns: For all other merchants except Glucose Goddess with the error message: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order value is not in Euros; convert it to Euros for Delivengo, as only Euros are accepted."
sendcloud
fixSteps: Reach out to the merchant and give them the following two options:
‚Ä¢ Cancel the shipment and create a duplicate with the order value in EUR, so we can process it with Delivengo.
‚Ä¢ Switch the carrier to Colissimo FR Domicile DAP International, which accepts GBP values.

title: For COD orders - ‚ÄúSendcleoud error occurred: This carrier is not available for this shipment‚Äù
patterns: For COD orders - ‚ÄúSendcleoud error occurred: This carrier is not available for this shipment‚Äù
fixSteps: Open URL for resolution

title: GLS carrier in Germany (GLS DE)- Unable to find sendcloud shipping method
patterns: GLS carrier in Germany (GLS DE)- Unable to find sendcloud shipping method
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check if weight is below 0.1 kg as GLS does not accept it.
Update weight to 0.101

title: GLS non_field_errors: "Service error: The receiver address cannot be validated by carrier. Please check city and state."
patterns: GLS non_field_errors: "Service error: The receiver address cannot be validated by carrier. Please check city and state."
city
fixSteps: This is because the City field is not recognized as a city. To fix this take the State/Province code and chop it in the city field, and take what was previously in the city field and put it in address line 2
Make sure to write the full state name in city field

title: GLS Specific ‚ÄúThe order number already exists‚Äù / ‚Äò‚ÄôThe provided order number already exists‚Äô‚Äô/ Service error: This order number is already used‚Äîplease enter a unique order number to proceed.
patterns: GLS Specific ‚ÄúThe order number already exists‚Äù / ‚Äò‚ÄôThe provided order number already exists‚Äô‚Äô/ Service error: This order number is already used‚Äîplease enter a unique order number to proceed.
fixSteps: We can only ship one shipment per day with the same order ID across all of our GLS Spain shipments.
Wait for one day to resolve the issue.
https://hive-logistics.slack.com/archives/C01C81H9KST/p1713187506510009?thread_ts=1713181020.382169&cid=C01C81H9KST for reference

Do not delete the phone number

fixSteps: This usually happens for the fields City and Street 2 try to put the information somewhere else and if we still can‚Äôt create a shipping label, remove the leftovers.

1. Check the address in Google Maps
1. If the street has house numbers, create address validation issue for missing house number
2. Id the address doesn‚Äôt have house numbers, enter a ‚Äò-‚Äô in the House number field.

Reach out to AM, we probably need new parcel label numbers because the carrier ran out.

phone

title: Postal code is invalid/missing
patterns: Postal code is invalid/missing
postal
fixSteps: United Arab Emirates and Hong Kong do not have postal codes. Therefore:
‚Ä¢ if we receive an error saying that it‚Äôs missing, add 00000 to the postal code
‚Ä¢ if we receive an error saying that postal code is not needed, remove it

sendcloud
fixSteps: if the address is to a packstation, this isnt possible with the shipment method wonderpack. Raise an address validation issue for full home address

title: Sendcloud error occurred: customs_shipment_type: "This field is required.", customs_invoice_nr: "This field is required.", parcel_items: "At least one parcel item is required‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: customs_shipment_type: "This field is required.", customs_invoice_nr: "This field is required.", parcel_items: "At least one parcel item is required‚Äù
sendcloud

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Carrier response doesn't contain a label."
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Carrier response doesn't contain a label."
sendcloud
fixSteps: look for unusual accents on the letters, and if you find some, this is likely the issue. Replace them with less unusual (but largely corresponding) letters

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Failed to parse carrier response with the: {http://error.global/}"
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Failed to parse carrier response with the: {http://error.global/}"
sendcloud
fixSteps: Happens with AVA&MAY in BER3 with their Poste Italiana contract. If there is any ‚Äò or special characters in the address, edit them to only have regular carachters. For example, Cassano d‚ÄôAdda‚Üí Cassano de Adda

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: No shipping method selected. Please choose a shipping method to proceed.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: No shipping method selected. Please choose a shipping method to proceed.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check if order is going to France:
‚Ä¢ if the merchant name is Baroni, change shipping method to Chronopost
‚Ä¢ If not, change to Colissimo FR Domicile w/o Signature

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Please provide parcel dimensions to proceed with the courier method.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Please provide parcel dimensions to proceed with the courier method.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: This error hints at missing parcel dimensions.

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The carrier response could not be parsed due to an issue with the recipient's name. Please verify the recipient's name fields and try again.", uncategorized: "non_field_errors‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The carrier response could not be parsed due to an issue with the recipient's name. Please verify the recipient's name fields and try again.", uncategorized: "non_field_errors‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: Look for ‚Äú;‚Äù in the name, company or address fields, ‚Üí remove it and retry, it should work

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The carrier returned an error with code 99999: Unknown reference number. Please verify the reference number and try again."
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The carrier returned an error with code 99999: Unknown reference number. Please verify the reference number and try again."
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check the shop order id. Check if its too long then shorten it.
Eg Merchant : ExpertWC

patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order number you provided is already in use, please verify it and try again.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: wait for a day, and retry the OLI tomorrow, should work

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The Royal Mail Service MP7 is suspended for the selected destination or format; please choose a different shipping service.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The Royal Mail Service MP7 is suspended for the selected destination or format; please choose a different shipping service.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: FROM NOT1 - USA( ONLY in this case
0- do basic checks( address, weight and api)
1- maek sure there are no dangerous goods in the shipment
2- It is under 5 kg
3- if both conditions appl >>> change the shipping method to
DPD UK - Hive (wonderpack) / DPD UK Direct International

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The service selected is not suitable for the contents and destination of the shipment; please verify service options.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The service selected is not suitable for the contents and destination of the shipment; please verify service options.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: Usually a message that hints that the shipping method selected is not valid for the destination. Verify the available shipping options on SC and the delivery pricing sheet. consult with the team for more alternatives.

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: validation_failed. Details: receiver.address.building_number - required"
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: validation_failed. Details: receiver.address.building_number - required"
sendcloud
fixSteps: Delete the house number and Apt.0 from the street field only make sure that there is a house number in the ‚Äòhouse number‚Äô field

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Your label could not be announced at this moment, most likely because of an outage. For more information please see: status.sendcloud.com"
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Your label could not be announced at this moment, most likely because of an outage. For more information please see: status.sendcloud.com"
sendcloud
fixSteps: If this appears it means there is some issue from sendcloud side. Mostly its a service error between sendcloud and carrier side. It gets solved after sometime or we can see the status in http://status.sendcloud.com or contact sendcloud support chat

title: Sendcloud error occurred: order_number: "String should have at most 15 characters: order_number‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: order_number: "String should have at most 15 characters: order_number‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: Raise a linear ticket to ask the tech team to reduce the shop order ID to under 15 characters. After they do this we will be able to print the labels.

title: Sendcloud error occurred: parcel_items: "{}, {'sku': ['This field may not be null.']}, {}"x
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: parcel_items: "{}, {'sku': ['This field may not be null.']}, {}"x
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check if the SKUs in the order all have SKU IDs.
If not, create SKU customs information missing issue.

title: Sendcloud error occurred: postal_code: "Enter a valid zip code."
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: postal_code: "Enter a valid zip code."
postal
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check the postal code on G Maps (exceptions: RoyalMail finder ‚Üí UK orders | GLS Portal for IT orders shipped via GLS)

title: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.‚Äù
sendcloud
fixSteps: This issue happens because the shop order ID exeeds 20 characters here is how to deal with it:
1- open sendcloud to the right fc
2- use the search funciton to search the shop order id to find the label
3- click on edit and instead of x characters for the shop order id, shorten it to 20
4- save adn print the label and manually upload it in the fc app( use the same shippping method )
5- to find the tracking number, maek sure to search the new 20 character shop order id in sendcloud!!!

title: Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions - COD orders
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions - COD orders
sendcloud
fixSteps: Is the order more than one shipment and all are COD ?
Does it say shipped for one of them?
if yes> wait, as the first shipment have to be delivered (confirm with the link or sendcloud)before the second shipment can be shipped
then the second shipment will be shipped with a non COD service
‚Üíif the first one was returned : contact the merchant and tell them to cancel adn create a new order

title: Sendcloud error occurred: to_service_point: "Service point carrier does not match shipping method.‚Äù
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: to_service_point: "Service point carrier does not match shipping method.‚Äù
to_service_point
sendcloud
fixSteps: Check the parcel point selected in PPP, this error usually indicates that the parcel point selected doesnt match the carrier

title: "Service error: Barcode range depleted for current contract.‚Äù
patterns: "Service error: Barcode range depleted for current contract.‚Äù
fixSteps: This is an error with Lettre Verte, we need to ask the Ops offering team to ask the carrier for more barcodes (order IDs).

title: "Service error: Carrier error: unable to save document in the database; try resubmitting the form.‚Äù
patterns: "Service error: Carrier error: unable to save document in the database; try resubmitting the form.‚Äù
fixSteps: from üá©üá™BER3 shipping to ITALY üáÆüáπ ‚Üí solution: remove special characters eg: ‚Äú c‚Äòe ‚Äù ‚ÄúD‚Äô aguila‚Äù from ALL FIELDS and retry.

title: Service error: Carrier returned an arror with code 10055 and message: The sorting plan was not found for the product Home (HOM), the country Portugal, the postal code 9000-254 and the collection point (if selected)‚Äù

postal
fixSteps: f shipping to Portuguese Islands, change the Mondial Relay shipping method to Colissimo FR Domicile DAP Europe

title: "Service error: Carrier returned error: the tracking label was not generated. Check the shipment documentation and try again.‚Äù
patterns: "Service error: Carrier returned error: the tracking label was not generated. Check the shipment documentation and try again.‚Äù
fixSteps: Check for any special characters within the address and name fields - remove them and retry

title: ‚ÄúService error: Das angegebene Produkt ist f√ºr das Land nicht verf√ºgbar.\
patterns: ‚ÄúService error: Das angegebene Produkt ist f√ºr das Land nicht verf√ºgbar.\
fixSteps: Check if the line two has too many characters and if so, try to move the information to company field. Then resolve the issue and try again

patterns: "Service error: Die Gewichtsangabe ist kleiner als im CN23-Formular‚Äù

title: "Service error: Failed to parse carrier response with the: generalShipmentData.recipient.name2"
patterns: "Service error: Failed to parse carrier response with the: generalShipmentData.recipient.name2"
fixSteps: Appears to be line2 character limit related

title: "Service error: The package exceeds the maximum allowable length; please reduce its size to comply with carrier requirements."
patterns: "Service error: The package exceeds the maximum allowable length; please reduce its size to comply with carrier requirements."
fixSteps: Usually an error due to the shop order id being too long, for these we search the order on SC, check if there are any labels in incoming orders with issues or announcement failed errors, remove spaces or extra chars (so that it is <=20 chars) from the shop order id on SC and try printing the label again.

title: Shipments to South Korea
patterns: Shipments to South Korea
fixSteps: Shipment method DHL DE Economy Paket DAP International
Maximum weight limit of each shipment is 20 Kgs.

title: ‚ÄùThe customer has asked to cancel. Could you kindly cancel this order for us on your end, please?‚Äù - in address fields
patterns: ‚ÄùThe customer has asked to cancel. Could you kindly cancel this order for us on your end, please?‚Äù - in address fields
fixSteps: Merchant: Reformed ( asana card should always be external) - more steps on the page

title: ‚ÄòThis carrier is not available for this shipment/ Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions
patterns: ‚ÄòThis carrier is not available for this shipment/ Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions
sendcloud
fixSteps: this error indicates that the shipment doesnt meet the selected shipping method requirments (i.e usually this is due to the shipment destination not being supported by the selected method)

title: unable to find sendcloud sencloud shipping method - minarda Piume COD orders - one order waiting for picking OOS
patterns: unable to find sendcloud sencloud shipping method - minarda Piume COD orders - one order waiting for picking OOS
sendcloud
fixSteps: However, one of the shipments is waiting for pickign and out of stock
1- if they all shipments are packed, make the label manually

2- because one is waiting for picking ‚Äî check if it is out of stock, click on the sku that is out of stock inventory information( check stock levels )- restock shipment - check if any are shipped or arrived‚Äî if if is wait until they are( if it soon) if not contact merchant to let them know about the delay in their shipment and why and what steps they want us to take as it is out of stock

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are currently no shipping services available for the recipient address. Please validate the recipient address and try again. If address is accurate, please ship these orders with a different shipping provider. (Code: A-300)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are currently no shipping services available for the recipient address. Please validate the recipient address and try again. If address is accurate, please ship these orders with a different shipping provider. (Code: A-300)
fixSteps: Verify the address on G-Maps, make sure the street, city and zip code match. Check https://weblabeling.gls-italy.com/ if the gls service is down for that area

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are no upcoming pickup slots available.Please adjust the pickup slot and retry. (Code: S-503)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are no upcoming pickup slots available.Please adjust the pickup slot and retry. (Code: S-503)
fixSteps: Check address fields - probably an address issue.

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order due to an internal service error. Please contact us for additional support. (S-900)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order due to an internal service error. Please contact us for additional support. (S-900)
fixSteps: Is this for the FC NOT1?
if yes>ignore
For FC MIL1,
there are three reasons for this error 1- too many characters 2- address is incorrect ( esp check the postal code) 3- incorrect characters

title: When the order has issues with Postfiliale
patterns: When the order has issues with Postfiliale
fixSteps: Postfiliales do not require a postnummer, so if the error message is ‚ÄúPostnummer or e-mail address is required‚Äù you can add 00000000 in the company field, to allow the order to be shipped as placeholder.
